homepage.heroSubtitle: Commitment, experience, and dedication to protect your rights and interests.

aboutpage.title: Commitment to Justice and Excellence
aboutpage.intro: I am Erika Morales, a lawyer dedicated to offering personalized, high-quality legal advice. My main goal is to thoroughly understand my clients' needs to build solid and effective legal strategies.
aboutpage.philosophyText: I believe in a legal practice based on trust, transparency, and constant communication. Every case is unique and deserves meticulous attention. I am committed to guiding you through every step of the legal process, clearly explaining your options so you can make informed decisions.
aboutpage.experienceText: With a strong track record in various areas of law, I have represented clients in complex negotiations and demanding litigation. My dedication is to secure the best possible outcome for you, your family, or your business.

servicespage.title: Practice Areas
servicespage.subtitle: I offer expert legal representation in a variety of disciplines for individuals and businesses.
servicespage.civilText: Defense and representation in cases involving contracts, debt claims, civil liability, leases, and property law.
servicespage.familyText: Guidance in divorce proceedings, child custody, alimony, inheritances, and estate planning.
servicespage.penalText: Assistance and defense at all stages of the criminal process, from arrest to trial, for all types of offenses.
servicespage.immigrationText: Management of residence permits, nationality applications, family reunification, and appeals against denials.

contactpage.title: Contact
contactpage.subtitle: I am here to help. Send your inquiry using the form or the direct contact details. The first consultation is confidential.

officeInfo.title: Our Firm
officeInfo.p1: We are a growing multidisciplinary firm, specializing in immigration law and dedicated to administrative, civil, criminal, labor, and social security law. We advise on and apply for all types of aid and grants.
officeInfo.p2: We offer bilingual translation services in English, Japanese, and Italian. French is also spoken.
officeInfo.p3: We collaborate with the tax and labor consultancy Pérez y Porras in Fuengirola, and with the notary Pablo Pol Seijas, a trusted professional in Fuengirola. Additionally, we work with various insurance brokerages, such as Fuengirola Brokers, among others. We operate throughout Spain, primarily on the Costa del Sol in Málaga and in Madrid.
